subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-east-1)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-east-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The admin-dashboard service in the us-east-1 region is experiencing critical performance degradation, with a frontend load time of 6258.06 ms. This issue is recurring and is likely caused by inefficient code execution or resource loading problems. Users may face slow page loads, leading to frustration and potential abandonment of the dashboard. The bundle size is 384.9 KB, with 36 resources loaded, indicating possible areas for optimization.

Service: admin-dashboard
Region: us-east-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 6258.06,
  "bundle_size_kb": 384.9,
  "resources_loaded": 36
}

Workaround: Investigate the frontend code for performance bottlenecks, optimize resource loading, and consider implementing lazy loading for non-critical resources. Customer notification is required due to the impact on user experience.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

extracted_fields.impact: Users may face slow page loads, leading to frustration and potential abandonment of the dashboard.
extracted_fields.requested_action: Investigate the frontend code for performance bottlenecks and optimize resource loading.

merged_extracted_fields.impact: Users may face slow page loads, leading to frustration and potential abandonment of the dashboard.
merged_extracted_fields.requested_action: Investigate the frontend code for performance bottlenecks and optimize resource loading.

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical performance degradation issue affecting the admin-dashboard, which significantly impacts user experience.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P1 priority. Escalated per enterprise account policy.
